mapper.sql:
FROM codeGroup a join code b on b.codeGroup_ccgSeq = a.ccgSeq WHERE 1=1 AND ccgDelNy = #{shDelNy}
AND ccgSeq = #{shValue} AND ccgName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ccSeq LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ccName LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ccNameEng LIKE CONCAT('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.ccgSeq ,a.ccgName ,b.ccSeq ,b.ccName ,b.ccUseNy ,b.ccOrder
ORDER BY b.ccSeq DESC
SELECT a.* FROM code a WHERE 1=1 AND ccSeq = #{ccSeq}
SELECT a.* FROM codeGroup a WHERE 1=1
mapper.update: UPDATE code SET ccDelNy = 1 WHERE ccSeq = #{ccSeq}
